channel.title: Need help port forwarding [ Xfinity Router ]
channel.description:
Can someone help me who has an Xfinity Router ? I have skype and can get team viewer .
Skype - divine.sins
Does anyone have an Xfinity router that can help..?

item.title: Need help port forwarding [ Xfinity Router ]
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

For some reason every time i have Xfinity internet and set up a locally hosted server, I don’t have to port forward and all the players can log in fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help port forwarding [ Xfinity Router ]
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

The Spiceworks Community

Port Forward settings on a Xfinity wireless modem

Hi all. I switched out my Netgear N600 router for a Xfinity Arris TG862G/CT when Comcast began charging a monthly rental fee for their hardware. Before the switch, I was usin...

That link may help you out, I don’t have any experience with Xfinity so I can’t really say much beyond this. Also, check out if your router is listed in this index, it may help you further:

http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm

Read full topic
item.source: Need help port forwarding [ Xfinity Router ]
